title: Atmosphere in motion
creator_credit: William Kay and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: Explores the causes and effects of atmospheric motion. Time-lapse photography makes the ordinarily slow movement of clouds readily observable and uses experiments to illustrate and explain other atmospheric phenomena.
description: Explores the causes and effects of atmospheric motion. Time-lapse photography makes the ordinarily slow movement of clouds readily observable and uses experiments to illustrate and explain other atmospheric phenomena.
